short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically evaluate professors with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Answering evaluation forms for PUP Isko's and Iska's is tiring and takes a lot of time. This extension allows you to easily populate an evaluation form with just one click, saving you your valuable time.
